32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: This tradition has been narrated by Ibn Abu Najah through a different chain of transmitters up to the word:Zahaqa, (This version) does not contain the second verse and substitutes Sanam for Nusub (both the words mean" idol" or" image" that is worshipped)

chapter.ara-name: باب إِزَالَةِ الأَصْنَامِ مِنْ حَوْلِ الْكَعْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Removal of Idols from around the Ka'bah
